Alexander Varvarenko – Investor, Entrepreneur, Speaker, and Visionary

Driving change, bridging technology with business, and transforming industries for a smarter future.

Founder of Bluemont Holding

Founder of Bluemont Holding, Alexander Varvarenko is a Belgian shipping and digital technology entrepreneur with 25 years of experience in international shipping and the transportation of dry bulk, breakbulk, and containerized cargo. His expertise spans both traditional maritime operations and cutting-edge digital solutions. He is the founder of Bluemont Holding, a group that encompasses key projects such as Shipnext, Varamar, Kaiser, the NewBrain Foundation, and the Remora Concept. Alexander’s commitment to driving innovation has been a defining force in his career, with a focus on integrating digital transformation and sustainable practices within the maritime industry. Through his work, he continues to lead the way in reshaping the future of shipping and logistics.

Alexander has also been a speaker at numerous international events, including major summits and conferences. A documentary featuring Alexander Varvarenko was produced by Reuters, highlighting his innovative products and the challenges and solutions surrounding them in the maritime industry. The film, part of the "Ocean Titans" series, showcases his commitment to leveraging data and automation for more efficient and sustainable shipping operations, while emphasizing the broader impact on corporate ocean responsibility.

Dedicated to creating companies that have a profound impact on the maritime industry, Alexander continues to lead the charge in digital transformation and sustainable innovations, shaping the future of global shipping.

“I've been dedicated to creating companies that have a profound impact on the maritime industry, leading the way in digital transformation and sustainable innovations. ”

Biography

  • Early Life and Education

    Born in Ventspils, Latvia in 1980, Alexander Varvarenko is of Belgian nationality. He pursued his education at Odessa National Maritime University (1998-2003) and the Institute of Chartered Shipbrokers (UK) (2002-2005).

  • Career Beginnings

    Alexander's career began in 2001, when he joined Belgo-Ruys and later Belgo-Iberian, representing shipping lines for major companies like ESCO (Estonian Shipping Company), SAMSKIP, and VOCs (Van-Omeren Clipper Steel Line).

  • Visionary Leadership

    As the founder of Bluemont Holding, Varvarenko has built a global portfolio of companies and initiatives that focus on combining traditional industries with cutting-edge technologies. His expertise in IT, software development, and shipping has allowed him to develop Shipnext, Varamar, and other transformative projects, positioning him as a leader in innovation.

  • Driving Technological Advancements

    Today, Varvarenko continues to drive technological advancements in shipping and transport, with a particular focus on sustainable solutions. His Remora Concept, which leverages nuclear power and autonomous navigation, is a prime example of his commitment to achieving net-zero emissions and transforming global transport.

“Efficiency isn't about moving faster—it’s about moving smarter. ”

Key Projects:
Revolutionizing Shipping with Digital Technology

Shipnext is the first digital shipping marketplace that integrates AI, big-data analysis, SaaS, and other cutting-edge technologies. It provides a seamless platform for optimizing and streamlining global shipping operations, making it a game-changer in the industry. In addition, Shipnext has joined BIMCO's technology partnership program, expanding its digital capabilities and reach.
